src:
REZZIME DANA (petak): Sveci zaribali kad nije trebalo
Pogledajte ko vam je 1. novembra doneo novac, a ko vas je prodao...

01 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici REZZIME DANA novinari portala MOZZART Sport koriste podatke kladionice MOZZART o najigranijim parovima tog dana, i na osnovu toga sumiraju koji su od najigranijih tipova prošli, a koji nisu.
OVDE pogledajte kako smo mi prošli u rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA.
Evo kako ste vi tipovali...

ZAOKRUŽENO

HOFENHAJM - PADERBORN (tip 1, kvota 1,50) - rezultat 3:0Posle samo dva minuta igre Skov je uspeo levicom da zatrese mrežu gostujućeg golmana Cingerlea prelepim udarcem sa gotovo 30 metara i najavio krah nejakih gostiju. Užasna odbrana Paderborna kapitulirala je još jednom u 15. minutu posle lepe akcije za Čeha Kaderžabeka, a konačan rezultat postavio je Jirgen Lokadija u 25. na pas već pomenutog Kaderžabeka koji je bio jedan od najboljih pojedinaca ovog meča.


OPŠIRNIJE OVDE


GALATASARAJ - RIZE (tip 1, kvota 1,50) - rezultat 2:0Sve najbitnije stalo je u četiri minuta. Toliko je bilo potrebno Galatasaraju, uz obilatu pomoć gostiju iz Rizea, da postigne dva gola i dobije prvi meč 10. kola prvenstva. Ako je neki navijač Galate morao da ode sa svog mesta na koji minut, propustio je vrhunac utakmice. Prvo je Rize sam sebi zatresao mrežu. Nesrećno je Talibi poslao loptu iza leđa svog golmana u 15. minutu. Svojski je fudbal zakucao u svoju mrežu, želeći da ga pošalje u korner. Utisci se nisu ni slegli, a novi kiks gostiju. Skrivili su penal, koji je Rajan Babel iskoristio da postavi konačnih 2:0.


OPŠIRNIJE OVDE


CVOLE - AJAKS (tip 2, kvota 1,12) - rezultat 2:4Dva puta Kvinsi Promes i jednom David Neres lako su nadigrali domaću odbranu i doneli veliku prednost timu Erika ten Haga od 3:0 posle samo 20 minuta igre. Shvativši da će odbranom samo doživeti katastrofu domaći fudbaleri su se oslobodili, a posle kiksa odbrane Kopljanika u 35. minutu Gustavo Hamer je smanjio rezultat. Zabrinuli su se gostujući fanovi za trenutak u 62. minutu kada je Mustafa Sajmak smanjio rezultat na 2:3, ali je na kraju to bilo sve što je Cvole prikazao. Ajaks je iskusno sačuvao prednost, a posle još jedne lepe akcije Zijeh je drugom asistencijom na meču omogućio još jedan pogodak Davidu Neresu za konačnih i zasluženih 4:2.
VITORUL - KINDIJA (tip 1, kvota 1,45) - rezulta 3:0Kindija iz Targovišta je bila preslabi protivnik za favorizovanu ekipu iz Konstance koja je povela već posle sedam minuta golom Georgea Ganee. Da nema ništa od iznenađenja na ovom susretu i da bodovi sigurno ostaju na istoku Rumunije bilo je jasno u 27. kada je defanzivac Bobok posle kornera povisio na 2:0. Drugo poluvreme pamtiće se po prvencu zvezde koja dolazi. Talentovani napadač Luis Munteanu (2002. godište) dobio je priliku u 56. minutu, a tačku na ovaj meč stavio je u poslednjim sekundama lepim udarcem za konačnih i zasluženih 3:0.
RID - HORN (tip 1, kvota 1,45) - rezultat 3:1Očekivano, bilo je lagano. Već u petom minutu Vajsmajer je doveo Rid do prednosti, da bi do kraja poluvremena duplirao na 2:0. Kara je iz penala vratio nadu Hornu, ali je trajala samo dva minuta, pošto je Grul u 52. minutu vratio na dva gola prednsti za domaćina, tako da je kec došao bez ikakve nervoze. 
TROA - VALENSIJEN (tip 1, kvota 1,45) - rezultat 1:0Bilo je na mišiće! Iako je Troa ušla u meč sa dve vezane pobede, a Valensijan sa dugom serijom bez trijumfa, domaći su se propisno oznojili da bi došli do nova tri boda. Jeste Kujate u 58. minutu doveo Trou do prednosti, međutim, u poslednjih 10 minuta gosti su imali igrača više, pritiskali su svom snagom, ali se rezultat nije promenio. 
DANDI - MORTON (tip 1, kvota 1,55) - rezultat 2:1 Sve što je vredelo viđeno je u drugom poluvremenu. Kec je došao, ali je bilo drhtanja sve do 80. minuta. A, kakav je hladan tuš bio sredinom prvog poluvremena, kada je Dandi poveo golom Hemingsa, da bi Morton izjednačio čim je krenuo s centra! Na kraju se proslavio rezervista Nes, koji je pet minuta nakon što je ušao u igru postigao gol za pobedu Dandija.

PRECRTANO

DE GRAFŠAP - EKSCELZIOR (tip 1, kvota 1,45) - rezultat 0:0 Prilično nezanimljiva utakmica, u kojoj su timovi bili ravnopravni, jednako bezopasni, s tim što su gosti imali nešto više udaraca u okvir gola. Ispostavilo se da je Ekscelzior dosta tvrđi orah nego što se mislilo, nažalost po one koji su ovde odigrali keca. 
DIŽON - PSŽ (tip 2, kvota 1,22) - rezultat 2:1Moćan jeste Pari Sen Žermen, ali nije svemoguć. I njemu dođe crni petak, pa padne u duelu sa - „fenjerašem“. Najčudniji rezultat dana, a teško da će i tokom celog vikenda biti nekog većeg iznenađenja. Poslednji tim na tabeli francuskog prvenstva, Dižon, pobedio je i to uz preokret šampiona i lidera PSŽ - 2:1.


OPŠIRNIJE OVDE


HANOVER - SANDHAUZEN (tip 1, kvota 2,00) - rezultat 1:1Osim bljeska i vodećeg gola Vejdanta već u sedmom minutu nisu mnogo toga pokazali domaći fudbaleri, a dozvolili su i igračima gostujućeg tima da igraju slobodno i prete iz opasnih kontri. I dočekali su fudbaleri iz Sandhauzena svoj trenutak. To je skromna ekipa koja ne igra dominantan fudbal, pa tako i dolazi u šanse. Slučajno. Posle sjajne akcije izigrali su domaću odbranu u 62. minutu, a Marokanac Buaduz koji se vratio u Cvajtu tokom leta iz Saudijske Arabije uspeo je da matria domaćeg golmana Cilera za konačnih 1:1.


OPŠIRNIJE OVDE
text:
DAY SUMMARY (Friday): Saints gasped when they shouldn't
Take a look at who brought you the money on November 1, and who sold you ...

01 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the DAY SUMMARY section, MOZZART Sport reporters use the MOZZART bookmakers' data on the most played pairs of the day, summarizing which of the most played types have passed and which have not.
See here how we went in the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section.
Here's how you guys typed ...

ROUNDED

HOFENHEIM - PADERBORN (Type 1, odds 1.50) - Score 3: 0After just two minutes of play, Skov managed to shake the net of the visiting goalkeeper Cingerle with a beautiful shot from almost 30 meters and announce the collapse of a few guests. Paderborn's terrible defense capitulated once again in the 15th minute after a nice action for Czech Kaderzabek, and the final result put Jirgen Lokadi in the 25th on the already mentioned Kaderzhabek, who was one of the best individuals of this match.


MORE HERE


GALATASARAJ - RIZE (Type 1, odds 1.50) - Score 2: 0The most important thing is to stop in four minutes. It took Galatasaray so much, with the great help of the guests from Rize, to score two goals and win the first match of the 10th round of the championship. If a Galate fan had to leave his place for a minute, he missed the highlight of the game. First, Rize shook the net himself. Unfortunately for Talibi, he sent the ball right behind his keeper after 15 minutes. He hooked his own football into his net, wanting to send him into the corner. Impressions didn't even settle, and a new guest mix. They hid a penalty, which Ryan Babel used to make the final 2-0.


MORE HERE


CVOLE - AJAKS (tip 2, odds 1.12) - Score 2: 4Two times the Queens Promes and once David Neres easily outplayed the home defense and brought a great 3-0 lead to Eric Ten Hague after only 20 minutes of play. Realizing that the defense would only be catastrophic, the home footballers freed themselves, and after a snap of the Kopljanik defense in the 35th minute, Gustavo Hamer reduced the score. The visiting fans were worried for a moment in the 62nd minute when Mustafa Sajmak reduced the score to 2: 3, but in the end it was all that Zvole showed. Ajax experienced the advantage, and after another nice action, Zijeh gave another assist to David Neres in the final and well-deserved 4: 2.
VITORUL - KINDIA (Type 1, odds 1.45) - Result 3: 0Kindia from Targovishte was too weak an opponent for the favored Constantine team to lead George Ganea after seven minutes. It was clear that there were no surprises at this match and that the points remain secure in the east of Romania in the 27th when defender Bobok increased to 2-0 after a corner. The second half will be remembered for the debut of the upcoming star. The talented striker Luis Munteanu (2002) got his chance in the 56th minute, putting the point to this match in the final seconds with a nice shot for the final and well deserved 3-0.
RID - HORN (Type 1, odds 1.45) - Score 3: 1 Expected, it was light. Already in the fifth minute Weissmeyer led Reid to the advantage, to double by 2: 0 by the end of the half. Kara restored hope to Horn, but it only lasted two minutes, as Grul returned in the 52nd minute to two goals ahead for the hosts, so the ace came without any nervousness.
TROA - VALENSIEN (type 1, odds 1,45) - result 1: 0 It was on the muscles! Although Troy entered the match with two tied wins, and Valencian with a long series without a triumph, the home team duly sweated to get another three points. Did Kuyate give Troy the lead in the 58th minute, however, in the last 10 minutes the guests had more players, they pressed with their strength, but the result did not change.
DANDY - MORTON (Type 1, odds 1.55) - Score 2: 1 All that was worth was seen in the second half. The ace came, but there was a tremor until the 80th minute. And what a cold shower it was in the middle of the first half, when Dundee led Hemings with a goal to equalize Morton as soon as he left the center! Eventually, Nes reservist, who scored a goal to win Dundee five minutes after entering the game, celebrated.

PRECRTANO

DE GRAPHSHAP - EXCELSIOR (Type 1, odds 1.45) - Score 0: 0 A rather uninteresting match in which the teams were equal, equally harmless, with the guests having a bit more shots in the goal frame. It turns out that Excelsior is a much harder nut than thought, unfortunately for those who played the ace here.
DIJON - PSG (tip 2, odds 1,22) - Score 2: 1Powerful is Paris Saint-Germain, but not almighty. Black Friday comes to him as well, so he falls into a duel with a "lantern". The strangest result of the day, and there will hardly be any major surprises throughout the weekend. The last team in the French Championship standings, Dijon, won with the reversal of champions and PSG leaders - 2: 1.


MORE HERE


HANOVER - SANDHAUZEN (tip 1, odds 2,00) - score 1: 1 Apart from the flashes and the leading goal by Veidant, the home footballers didn't show much in the seventh minute, and they allowed the away team's players to play freely and threaten with dangerous counter-attacks. And the players from Sandhausen welcomed their moment. It's a modest team that doesn't play dominant football, so it comes with a chance. Coincidentally. After brilliant action, they played home defense in the 62nd minute, and Moroccan Buaduz, who returned to Zweit in the summer from Saudi Arabia, managed to matriculate the home goalkeeper Ciller for the final 1: 1.


MORE HERE
